column4: hey need some advice to remove ubuntu partition and retain vista.
i am doing this cos i want to shift to the wubi installer
I presently have Ubuntu on a partition of my laptop hdd
i want to remove ubuntu and retain vista
did you do a non-wubi install?  Then just format the partition.
yes its a non wubi install that I am using now. But then wat abt the grub? i would like to get my old mbr back too
i dont have a vista installation disc cos it came oem installed
ah. from a windows CD, run fixmbr
:( i dont have the disc. I have a recovery drive created by HP, but the damn thing doesnt give me a cli to run fixmbr!
oh, so you don't have a installed recovery console?  then your pooched
but it doesnt throw up the cli. i get a gui that asks me if I want to restore to factory settings or restore to an old date
I can't help with windows issues
you may want to backup any data, and reinstall
